void SetLabel (const wxString &label)
 Set an optional text label. The label will be rendered inside the skin.

Detailed Description

wxSkinButton is a simple skinned button class

wxSkinButton is a button created from different skins. To catch its events use the standard EVT_BUTTON() macro.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void wxSkinButton::DrawCustom ( wxDC &  dc  )  [virtual]

Overwrite this method in derived classses.

This method will be called after the standard drawing action has been completed. This allows to do some non-standard drawing in dervied controls.

Implements wxSkinWindow.
